DOC.brief_summary: Long-Term Objectives : - To establish ongoing national research registry epidemiologic , clinical pathologic data low grade low malignant potential ( LMP ) ovarian cancer patient UTMDACC 's Department Gynecologic Oncology research purpose . - To create bank low grade LMP ovarian cancer tumor block study molecular histopathologic difference among low grade ovarian cancer , ovarian LMP tumor high grade ovarian cancer . - To specify epidemiologic clinical profile low grade LMP ovarian cancer patient . - To identify potential precursor low grade LMP ovarian cancer . - To assess treatment pattern guide management disease . - To collect quality life health outcome data patient . - To achieve fundamental understand low grade LMP ovarian cancer inform prevention screen effort , motivate development improve treatment eventually result cure . The short-term objective : - To detail procedure potential registrant identification recruitment . - To create demographic health history questionnaire potential registrant . - To begin aggregate low grade low malignant potential ovarian tumor block . - To specify timeline development aspect Registry .
DOC.brief_title: Elizabeth Registry Low Grade Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The Registry ongoing research registry include patient diagnose low grade ovarian , primary peritoneal fallopian tube low malignant potential ( LMP ) ovarian , primary peritoneal fallopian tube cancer . In order enroll Registry , ask complete 65 page questionnaire contain question ovarian cancer diagnosis , gynecologic history , family history , general medical history , health risk factor . This questionnaire take 1 hour complete . In addition , researcher look medical record pathology sample store M. D. Anderson get information surgery , treatment , disease course , tumor grade . If original surgery perform M. D. Anderson , may ask provide tumor specimen surgery enrol Registry . You contact annually Registry Coordinator update demographic health information . This investigational study . The Registry eventually enroll M. D. Anderson non-M. D. Anderson patient . The number registrant unlimited Registry ongoing . This study partially fund research grant Elizabeth Fund Study Low Grade Ovarian Carcinoma .
